Tranmere Tweets

Posted to Mottr.am by Jack on 14 September 2009. Tagged trfc and twitter.

Officially the most depressing Twitter account. And yet I keep device updates on. Update: the official Tranmere Twitter is a much more pleasant read than the onslaught of defeat provided by the live scores.
